tool_description: Processes submitted volunteer applications, extracts structured data, performs initial screening, and flags incomplete or problematic submissions.

form_id.description: ID of the application form to process

submission_ids.description: List of application submission IDs to process

auto_screen.description: Whether to perform automatic initial screening

minimum_requirements.description: List of minimum requirements to check against

error_messages: Form not found: The specified form_id does not exist.
Invalid submission IDs: One or more submission IDs are not valid.
Processing failed: Unable to extract data from one or more applications.
Empty submission list: At least one submission ID must be provided.
usage: Provide the form ID and list of submission IDs to process. Optionally enable auto-screening and specify minimum requirements. The tool will extract and structure application data.

passed_screening.description: Submission IDs that passed initial screening

incomplete_applications.description: Submission IDs with missing required information

processing_summary.description: Summary of processing results and next steps
